endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all food and beverage products available for evaluation.
Submit a product for alignment evaluation against dietary recommendations.
Fetch a summary of dietary guidelines used for evaluation.
Submit user feedback for enhancing evaluation processes.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product using its unique identifier.
Remove a product previously submitted for evaluation from the system.
Update details of a previously submitted product.
View the evaluation history for all previously assessed products.
Obtain compliance requirements for a specific geographical region.
Access data on current health and wellness trends derived from evaluations.
